description: The Ashikabi controlling the southern part of the city. He is 15 years old, and has been shown to have no tolerance for failure. He is one of the more complex characters with his personality being fairly different with each of his appearances. In his first appearance he seem very curl only caring about "winging" Kusano and calling Yomi useless. Whereas in second appearance he seemed easy going and a carefree.
name: Mikogami Hayato
